text: Guatteria anomala is a species of plant in the Annonaceae family. It is found in El Salvador, Guatemala, and Mexico. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Guatteria anomala. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Guatteria anomala
